headline.main: ITALIANS CONVICTED OF SABOTAGING SHIP; Jacksonville Jury Finds Captain and Twenty Seamen Guilty

lead_paragraph: JACKSONVILLE, Fla., May 1 -- The captain and twenty members of the crew of the Italian freighter Confidenza were found guilty late today of "violating the hospitality and safety of the harbor" here by destroying the vessel's engines before it was seized by the United States Government.
abstract: capt and 20 Itals from SS Confidenza convicted; 20 others acquitted, Jacksonville, Fla
